meanings.definition: A type of hat worn by chefs.
meanings.sent1: The chef put on his white toques before starting to cook.
meanings.sent2: In the kitchen, it is common to see chefs wearing toques.
meanings.sent3: The toques worn by the chefs made them look like professionals.
meanings.sent4: The toques on the chefs' heads were like crowns in the kitchen.
meanings.sent5: The toques added a touch of elegance to the chefs' uniforms.

meanings.definition: A type of hat worn in Canada during the winter.
meanings.sent1: During the cold Canadian winter, people wear cozy toques to keep warm.
meanings.sent2: In Canada, it is essential to have a toques to stay comfortable in the winter.
meanings.sent3: The colorful toques in Canada brighten up the snowy landscape.
meanings.sent4: The toques in Canada are like little warm hugs for your head.
meanings.sent5: The toques with pom-poms are a fun winter accessory in Canada.

meanings.definition: A type of hat worn by musicians in a marching band.
meanings.sent1: The musicians in the marching band wore matching toques during the parade.
meanings.sent2: The toques added a stylish touch to the marching band uniforms.
meanings.sent3: The toques on the musicians made them look like a colorful group.
meanings.sent4: The toques in the marching band ensemble were like beacons in the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The toques completed the musicians' uniform for the performance.
